TermDefinition.DefinitionText: Cancer has spread through the wall of the vagina to the tissue around the vagina. Cancer has not spread to the wall of the pelvis.

MediaLink.alt: Pronunciation of dictionary term "stage II vaginal cancer"
Pronunciation of dictionary term "cáncer de vagina en estadio ll"

GlossaryTerm.SpanishTermName: cáncer de vagina en estadio ll

SpanishTermDefinition.DefinitionText: El cáncer se diseminó a través de la pared de la vagina hasta el tejido que la rodea. El cáncer no se ha diseminado a la pared de la pelvis.
